name: kalashnikov
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of assault rifle (= a light gun with a long barrel that can fire many bullets quickly) originally made in the Soviet Union: One man, holding a Kalashnikov, stood guard. We heard the sound of gunfire from a Kalashnikov rifle. Synonym
AK-47
More examplesFewer examplesThe city streets were empty, with only flatbed trucks carrying soldiers pointing their Kalashnikovs menacingly in every direction.He was carrying a Kalashnikov assault rifle when he was captured.They had heavy weapons and rockets and Kalashnikovs and grenades. A female fighter sat under a canopy of tree branches on a nearby hill, her Kalashnikov rifle at her side.
